      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf022b-1388-4226-25a0-8dbf4f7ea447#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A kölni városháza tornya, 1407-1410, Köln, Németország.</string>
            <string language="en">The tower of the town-hall of Cologne, 1407-1410, Cologne, Germany</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Aufsatz der Stadt-Halle von Köln, 1407-1410,
Köln, Deutschland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La tour du ville-hall de Cologne, 1407-1410, 
Cologne, Allemagne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A torre do cidade-salão de Colónia, 1407-1410, 
Colónia, Germany</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La torretta del città-corridoio di Colonia, 
1407-1410, Colonia, Germania</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο πύργος της πόλη-αίθουσας της Κολωνίας, 1407-1410,
Κολωνία, Γερμανία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La torre del ciudad-pasillo de Colonia, 1407-1410,
Colonia, Alemania</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A kölni városháza tornya, amelynek ornamentikája a gótikus katedrálisok pompáját idézi.</string>
            <string language="en">The tower of the town-hall of Cologne, whose ornamentation represents the splendour of the Gothic cathedrals </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Köln,  kölni városháza,  középkori város,  torony,  </string>
            <string language="en">Cologne, town-hall of Cologne, medieval town, tower</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Aufsatz der Stadt-Halle von Köln, dessen 
Verzierung die Pracht der gotischen Kathedralen darstellt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La tour du ville-hall de Cologne, dont l'ornement
représente le splendour des cathédrales gothiques</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A torre do cidade-salão de Colónia, cujo o 
ornamentation representa o splendour das catedrais gothic</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La torretta del città-corridoio di Colonia, di 
cui il ornamentation rappresenta lo splendour delle cattedrali 
gotiche</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο πύργος της πόλη-αίθουσας της Κολωνίας, η της οποίας
διακόσμηση αντιπροσωπεύει το splendour των γοτθικών καθεδρικών 
ναών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La torre del ciudad-pasillo de Colonia, que 
ornamentation representa el esplendor de las catedrales góticas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Köln, Stadt-Halle von Köln, mittelalterliche Stadt, 
Aufsatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cologne, ville-hall de Cologne, ville médiévale, 
tour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Colónia, cidade-salão de Colónia, cidade medieval, 
torre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Colonia, città-corridoio di Colonia, città medioevale,
torretta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κολωνία, πόλη-αίθουσα της Κολωνίας, μεσαιωνική πόλη, 
πύργος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colonia, ciudad-pasillo de Colonia, ciudad medieval, 
torre</string>
          </keyword>

          </description>
